title: Beauty of White Marble.
review: Its a beautiful tomb made of white marble by the two sons of Abdullah Khan in his memory. The towers surrounding it are amzingly carved.

title: Good Tomb
review: The tomb is located on a raised platform with four steps.The rectangular tomb has been designed with four towers and bended arches that are ornamental.The tomb reflects the designs of later Mughal era.

title: Peacful place
review: This place was very much peaceful. I loved this place a lot. Many people come here and spend some time here.

title: White tomb
review: Abdullah khan tomb is great tomb .this tomb is built by white marble.this tomb is built by 2 son of abdullah khan in his memory.

title: Tomb
review: Abdullah khan's Tomb is nice historical building in memory of Abdullah khan. This beautiful building is contrast by with marble.

title: Extremely rare
review: This sight made on me the strongest impression in Ajmer – disproportionate to its size and distance from the center of the city (obviously more than those numbers that are in the guidebooks). I remember a similar feeling I had in Agra as we drove the 40 minutes to the "baby Taj" (Itimad-ad-daulah. The same white marble rectangular form of the building without curves and equally elegant, graceful, though in vision  deceptively simple structure. But there's some amazing proportionality, some underlined nobility of shape, which is difficult to achieve and extremely rare. It has become my reward, that compensated the incomprehensibility of some attractions of Ajmer and Taragarh Fort.

title: Not a must visit, but a good one
review: The simple yet elegant Abdullah Khan's Tomb is built in 1700's AD using white marble.

title: Good...
review: Great place to visit. So peaceful place all my fatigue came away by coming here. It is completely built by white marble so it looking beautiful. Architecture also great.

title: Nice Tomb
review: Abdullah Khan's Tomb dates back centuries old and is a famous tourist attraction in Ajmer Village - outskirts

title: Multiple people come here
review: Many people come here at this place and spend some time with family and kids. Peaceful place and positive ambience.

title: Nice place to visit
review: Architecture always attracts me. This is a nice place to visit,  and the architecture is a interesting. If you have time do visit this place with kids
